english_example_sentence: You must produce quality products in these modern machines.
russian_example_sentence: Вы должны производить качественную продукцию на этих современных станках.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu modern makinelerde kaliteli ürünler üretmelisiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz bu modern makinelerde kaliteli ürünler ______.
